com.ibm.team.scm.common

Class ContentHash

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.team.scm.common.ContentHash

  • public final class ContentHash
extends java.lang.Object
    Wrapper for the hash of versionable content.
    Since:
    0.7

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String HASH_ALGO
      The algorithm used to compute the content hash
      static int HASH_CODED_LEN
      The length of the code produced by StringCoder.encode() when supplied a byte array produced by the digest algorithm
      static int HASH_RAW_LEN
      The length of the raw byte array produced by the algorithm

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj) 
      byte[] getBytes()
      Return the actual content hash bytes in case a caller doesn't like the default string encoding.
      static com.ibm.team.internal.repository.rcp.streams.DigestComputingOutputStream getDigestComputingOutputStream(java.io.OutputStream out)
      Wrap the supplied output stream in a DigestComputingOutputStream using the algorithm necessary for computing content hashes
      static com.ibm.team.internal.repository.rcp.streams.DigestComputingInputStream getDigestComputingStream(java.io.InputStream in)
      Wrap the supplied input stream in a DigestComputingInputStream using the algorithm necessary for computing content hashes
      static java.security.MessageDigest getHashDigest()
      Returns the message digest implementing the algorithm needed for computing hashes of versioned content.
      int hashCode() 
      java.lang.String toString() 
      static ContentHash valueOf(byte[] digest)
      Create a ContentHash from the raw byte array returned by a message digest.
      static ContentHash valueOf(java.io.InputStream in)
      Create a ContentHash from the contents of the supplied InputStream.
      static ContentHash valueOf(java.lang.String hash)
      Create a ContentHash from the encoded String produced by encoding the byte array returned from the message digest using StringCoder.encode() or returned from the ContentHash.toString() method This method returns null when the passed in hash is null.

        clone, finalize, getClass, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

      • getDigestComputingStream

        public static com.ibm.team.internal.repository.rcp.streams.DigestComputingInputStream getDigestComputingStream(java.io.InputStream in)
                                                                                                        throws ContentHashAlgorithmException
        Wrap the supplied input stream in a DigestComputingInputStream using the algorithm necessary for computing content hashes
        Throws:
        ContentHashAlgorithmException

      • getDigestComputingOutputStream

        Throws:
        ContentHashAlgorithmException

      • getHashDigest

        public static java.security.MessageDigest getHashDigest()
                                                 throws ContentHashAlgorithmException
        Returns the message digest implementing the algorithm needed for computing hashes of versioned content.
        Throws:
        ContentHashAlgorithmException

      • valueOf

        public static ContentHash valueOf(java.io.InputStream in)
                           throws java.io.IOException,
                                  ContentHashAlgorithmException
        Create a ContentHash from the contents of the supplied InputStream. Note: the input stream is read until -1 is returned. It is NOT closed. It is the caller's responsibility to close the supplied InputStream.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        ContentHashAlgorithmException

      • valueOf

        public static ContentHash valueOf(byte[] digest)
        Create a ContentHash from the raw byte array returned by a message digest.

      • valueOf

        public static ContentHash valueOf(java.lang.String hash)
        Create a ContentHash from the encoded String produced by encoding the byte array returned from the message digest using StringCoder.encode() or returned from the ContentHash.toString() method This method returns null when the passed in hash is null.
